title: MMR Flex/Solo
body:
Greetings Summoners!!

So currently im Diamond V in Solo q and Gold IV in Flex. So am i keeping my mmr from solo q in both queues or are they seperate from each other and my mmr in flex stays at Gold and my solo q stays at dia? 

Thanks for your help.

replies.body: The queues are totally separate, and your MMR independent.  You'll want to maintain your rating in both queues individually!
Okey, thank you for your response.
